abstract: NFL Roundup; group of retired NFL players seek new review of concussion settlement, which provides up to $4 million to individual players with severe neurological diseases, including chronic traumatic encephalopathy; other football news noted.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Players Seek New Review of Concussion Settlement
headline.main: Retired N.F.L. Players Appeal Ruling on Concussion Settlement

snippet: Some former N.F.L. players have objected to the settlement because of the way C.T.E. is treated in the deal.
lead_paragraph: Some former N.F.L. players have objected to the settlement because of the way C.T.E. is treated in the deal.
